body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Data Solutions Inc. My name is Bruce Bryant and I will be assisting you today. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Danielle. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your phone number? You can spell out each number for security purposes.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven seven two three one one four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And can you also provide me with your home address so we can update our records accordingly?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's three two zero Elm Street, Oakdale, New York, one two zero zero three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Danielle. Your information has been noted. Is there anything else you would like to address or inquire about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, everything's been sorted out. I'm feeling relieved. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Danielle. Thank you for your time and cooperation. If you have any further questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
